news.title: Consumer prices rose at annual rate of 2.9% in August, as weekly jobless claims jump
news.summary: The consumer price index was expected to increase 0.3% in August, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate. The Consumer Price Index is a measure of the cost of living.

news.title: UK sacks U.S. Ambassador Peter Mandelson over Epstein links
news.summary: Mandelson's apparent close friendship with Epstein was revealed in documents released by U.S. lawmakers this week. Mandelson is a former chairman of the New York City subway system.

news.title: 10-year Treasury yield falls to 4% then snaps back as traders assess inflation data
news.summary: Traders assessed a raft of economic signals Thursday morning. Traders assessed a series of economic signs Thursday morning, including a strong jobs report.

news.title: Charlie Kirk shooter: FBI, Utah police to give update as manhunt continues
news.summary: Kirk, a close ally of President Donald Trump, was killed by a gunman during a political event at Utah Valley University in Orem.

news.title: Trump’s pressure on Europe to slap 100% tariffs on India and China raises eyebrows
news.summary: Europe is unlikely to acquiesce to the White House's request to slap high tariffs on its Asian counterparts. The White House wants to impose tariffs of up to 25 per cent on Chinese imports.

news.title: Gold keeps setting records — but its September trading pattern could be a roadblock
news.summary: Seasonal strength doesn’t show up year after year. Seasonal strength is more about what you do in the off-season. That’s what we’re looking for.

news.title: ‘My income is not enough’: I’m a single parent in my early 50s. Should I add my kids, 23 and 29, to my mortgage application?
news.summary: “I want to purchase a family home so we three don’t have to pay rent,” she says. “I’m looking forward to the day when I can buy a house with my family.”

news.title: Apple’s stock is stuck in a rut. Why this bull just threw in the towel.
news.summary: D.A. Davidson says Apple “was either caught off-guard by AI or is genuinely facing innovator’s dilemma and cannot innovate”

news.title: First-time unemployment claims surge to 263,000 — the highest level in nearly four years
news.summary: The labor market has slowed markedly this summer. Businesses have stopped hiring due to uncertainty over the cost and impact of tariffs on imported goods.

news.title: Always trust your first guess: One Wall Street bank is reinstating its bullish S&P 500 target
news.summary: Deustche Bank says it now expects the S&P 500 to reach its original target of 7000 at the end of this year.
